messages.message:
I was talking with a partner, and he mentioned that their client want to automate an use case, where everything start with an email + attachments.
The questions was, if we can identify inline images (in the email itself, not attachments).
Like in a Signature, the Linkedin, fb etc icons.

an example from the partner attached
So they will not be separated out or treated as an attachment but will treated like the following email and how it appears in Build

+1 to what KD said about the images not being separated out

The images could still be identified and described using visual reasoning, though
